GPURenderPassEncoderLabel.summary:
The label read-only property of the
interface is a string providing a label that can be used to identify the object, for example in messages or console warnings.

remarks.para: This can be set by providing a label property in the descriptor object passed into the originating call, or you can get and set it directly on the GPURenderPassEncoder object.

GPURenderPassEncoderLabel.value: A string. If no label value has previously been set, getting the label returns an empty string.
